content.question: Leonardo da Vinci’s Last Supper and Raphael’s School of Athens are similar in that both use linear perspective to

choices.label: convey a sense of sacred geometry through an emphasis on orthogonal lines and cool colors
create a focus on important figures who are positioned at the vanishing point in a crowded composition
cause an illusion of spatial depth that visually enlarged the space in the chapels where the works were placed
encourage multiple views by enabling the works to be approached from different vantage points

content.answer: create a focus on important figures who are positioned at the vanishing point in a crowded composition
